ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
Interactive time-frequency analysis for biological data
using wavelets. Features optimal sinc filter for
detrending and provides phase, period and amplitude
extraction of non-stationary oscillatory signals.
about.summary: pyBOAT - A Biological Oscillations Analysis Toolkit

app.summary: pyBOAT GUI - Interactive wavelet analysis for biological data. Provides phase, period and amplitude extraction of non-stationary oscillatory signals.'

about.description:
Interactive time-frequency analysis for biological data
using wavelets. Features optimal sinc filter for
detrending and provides phase, period and amplitude
extraction of non-stationary oscillatory signals.
about.summary: pyBOAT - A Biological Oscillations Analysis Toolkit

app.summary: pyBOAT GUI - Interactive wavelet analysis for biological data. Provides phase, period and amplitude extraction of non-stationary oscillatory signals.'

name: pyboat
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyboat" %}
{% set version = "1.0.0" %}
{% set python_min = "3.11" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c0cbb5d16e2e6f70ad85423a1fa9c9370e7b8be024523261212e02da4882004f
build:
  number: 3
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - pyboat = pyboat:main
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - flit-core >=3.11,<4
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy >=2
    - scipy >=1.15
    - matplotlib >=3.10
    - pandas >=2
    - pyqt6 >=6.8
    - openpyxl >=3.1.3
    
test:
  imports:
    - pyboat
  requires:
    - pytest
  source_files:
    - tests  
  commands:
    - pytest -v
    - python -c "from PyQt6.QtWidgets import QWidget"   

app:
  entry: pyBOAT
  summary: pyBOAT GUI - Interactive wavelet analysis for biological data. Provides phase, period and amplitude extraction of non-stationary oscillatory signals.'
  type: desk
  icon: logo_circ128x128.png

about:
  home: https://github.com/tensionhead/pyboat
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: pyBOAT - A Biological Oscillations Analysis Toolkit
  description: "Interactive time-frequency analysis for biological data\nusing wavelets. Features optimal sinc filter for\ndetrending and provides phase, period and amplitude\nextraction of non-stationary oscillatory signals."
  dev_url: https://github.com/tensionhead/pyboat

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - tensionhead
